sentences.en: A roll or throw of the ball, as in bowling.
sentences.cn: 沿着界内滚动的地滚球.

sentences.en: But there is a bowling alley, right ?
sentences.cn: 但是这里确实有保龄球道, 不是 吗 ?

sentences.en: Do you want to go bowling with us Friday?
sentences.cn: 星期五想和我们一起去打保龄球吗？

sentences.en: Everyone wanted to bowl, hence everyone wanted to open a bowling alley.
sentences.cn: 大家都想玩保龄球，因此大家都想开保龄球馆。

sentences.en: Familiar man - sized " particles " include bowling balls, golf balls, and table tennis balls.
sentences.cn: 我们所熟悉的人体尺度 “ 粒子 ” 有滚木球 、 高尔夫球 、 乒乓球.

sentences.en: Gooch last night pointed to their bowling as the key to World Cup success.
sentences.cn: 古奇昨晚指出，他们的投球是在世界杯上取得成功的关键。

sentences.en: He takes to bowling with a few of them.
sentences.cn: 他还常常跟几个同事去打保龄球.

sentences.en: I can't see the point of bowling a ball like that.
sentences.cn: 我看不出那样投球用意何在。

sentences.en: I could use some free rental on bowling shoes on Saturday.
sentences.cn: 星期六我要租些保龄球鞋可以不给租金吗?
我打保龄球是为了消遣。

sentences.en: Middlesex defeated Derbyshire by bowling out the opposition.
sentences.cn: 米德尔塞克斯队将德比郡队的所有队员都投杀出局，击败了对方。

sentences.en: Playing billiards , golf or bowling, isn't it just pushing balls around?
sentences.cn: 台球、保龄球 、 高尔夫球, 无非是球.

sentences.en: Right. Bowling is also an indoor sport.
sentences.cn: 对. 保龄球也是室内运动.

sentences.en: Ten pin bowling was only an exhibition sport in 1988 Seoul Olympics.
sentences.cn: 十瓶式保龄球赛在1988年汉城奥运会上只是一项表演赛.

sentences.en: The aim in bowling is to knock down all the pins with one or two bowls.
sentences.cn: 保龄球的目标是一球或两球击倒所有瓶形滚柱.

sentences.en: We were bowling along ( the motorway ) at seventy miles per hour.
sentences.cn: 我们以每小时七十英里的速度 ( 在高速公路上 ) 飞驰.

words.tran_cn: 圆顶礼帽；投球手；玩滚球的人
玩保龄球；滑动；平稳快速移动
投球；旋转；平稳快速移动

phrases.tran_cn: 保龄球馆；球戏场；滚球槽
n. 草地保龄球场；玩滚木球草地

trans.tran_en: an indoor game in which you roll a large heavy ball along a wooden track in order to knock down a group of  pin s (=  wooden objects shaped like bottles  )
